A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I watched this movie a week ago and have been pissed since I’ve watched it. There are so many holes in this movie. Nothing is explained. Luke Skywalker is a great Jedi and they crap on him and kill him off. He was a grumpy hateful old man the entire movie only to have him killed off. I hate this movie!
